title: Death anniversary of poet Munawwar Badayuni observed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 7 (APP):The 41st death anniversary of famous Urdu poet Munawwar Badayuni was observed on Monday.
Munawwar Badayuniâ€™s real name was Saqlain Ahmed and he was born on December 2, 1908 in Badayun, India.
Munawwar Badayuni got fame by his Hamdiya and Naatiya poetry.
